Class UserInterface

java.lang.Object
UserInterface
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.event.ActionListener, java.util.EventListener
public class UserInterface
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.awt.event.ActionListener
This class is part of the RPandaScape application. RPandaScape is a very simple, text based adventure game. This class implements a simple graphical user interface with a text entry area, a text output area, an image and a button.
Version:
1.0 (Jan 2003) DB edited (2019) edited (2021)
Author:
Michael Kolling + Elie DUBOUX

  • Constructor Details

    • UserInterface

      public UserInterface​(GameEngine pGameEngine)
      Construct a UserInterface. As a parameter, a Game Engine (an object processing and executing the game commands) is needed.
      Parameters:
      pGameEngine - The GameEngine object implementing the game logic.

  • Method Details

    • print

      public void print​(java.lang.String pText)
      Print out some text into the text area.
      Parameters:
      pText - The text to print.

    • println

      public void println​(java.lang.String pText)
      Print out some text into the text area, followed by a line break.
      Parameters:
      pText - The text to print.

    • showImage

      public void showImage​(java.lang.String pImageName)
      Show an image file in the interface.
      Parameters:
      pImageName - The path and the name of the image.

    • enable

      public void enable​(boolean pOnOff)
      Enable or disable input in the input field.
      Parameters:
      pOnOff - True when you can write on the entry field, false otherwise.

    • actionPerformed

      public void actionPerformed​(java.awt.event.ActionEvent pEvent)
      Actionlistener interface for entry textfield.
      Specified by:

      Parameters:
      pEvent - The event when a button is clicked.
